data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix sibirica (Siberian larch) from sample KOHILASI-101

Exposition SW, Slope 12 deg, Geology: Ranker/Gneis, Tree line 2300 m, av. Tree height 28 m, Tree cover 10%, Shrub cover 80%, Herb cover 20%, Moss cover 100%, Vegatation type: Lä-Wald (evtl. beweidet), Film number: 1015A
